title: Tech Bus SL moves to Divulapitiya
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Tech Bus SL program which is organized by the Sri Lanka Institute of Information Technology (SLIIT) with News 1st took place on Friday (18) at the
The program moves from village to village sharing the latest trends in technology among the students in rural Sri Lanka.
In parallel to this, a program is being implemented every Thursday at 3 p.m to impart technical knowledge to the children through Zoom technology.
Massive Protest in Colombo; Socialist Youth protest against govt decisions
